root.name: Space Interceptor
root.description: In this space shooter you are the pilot of a space fighter and have to fight your way through a variety of worlds\spaces and enemies. You represent the Project Freedom company and have to battle other companies for domination. The game consist of 21 missions in which you have to battle other space ships, but also have to rescue missions. Battles mostly take place in space but also on the planet surface.Systeem requirementsOS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7Processor: Pentium III 700 MHz processorMemory: 256 MB RAMGraphics: ATI Radeon 7500 or GeForce 2 with 32 MB RAMDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0
